name: Tsuridou: Umitsuri-hen
overview: Tsuridou - Umitsuri-hen (Tsuwadou Seabass Fishing) is a 2D fishing game in focused on the coast fishing, the player can choose between different fishing spots and lures before start fishing. The game features a lot of different fishing spots and 2 game modes: - Story mode: Put a name to your character, go to different shops to buy lures, rod, equipment, etc. After that go to different fishing spots and start fishing. The game features different tournaments and prizes, and also a complete fish encyclopedia with photos of the different species. - Free mode: Choose any fishing spot and start fishing.
